description:
Much like our favourite trails, steps taken show a toll on us too. For feet showing the kilometers, these boots are shaped for wearers with bunions. The spacious and seamless big-toe zone reduces abrasion points. A supportive midsole and cushioning inserts supports feet and reduces trail bumps

  • Nubuck upper is tough yet flexible
  • Gore-Tex waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry and comfortable in all weather conditions
  • Soft, chromium-free leather lining is seamless in bunion area for comfort
  • Last provides space around the big toe joint
  • High-volume toe box provides room for overlapping toes
  • Heel tension system for a secure, supportive fit
  • Shock absorbing heel and forefoot insert
  • Vibram® Endurance Pro rubber outsole provides traction in rough terrain
name: Hanwag Alta Bunion II Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Women's
